contentrichtext.text: __NOTOC__ '''Kokomo''' may refer to: ==Places== * [[Kokomo, Indiana]], a city located in Howard County, Indiana, United States, that is also its county seat ** [[Indiana University Kokomo]] * [[Kokomo, Mississippi]], United States * [[Kokomo, Hawaii]], United States, on the island of Maui * [[Sandals Cay]] (formerly Kokomo Island), a privately owned island in Jamaica ==In music== * [[Kokomo Arnold]], the stage name of the 1930s blues musician James Arnold * "[[Ko Ko Mo (I Love You So)]]", song by [[Jack Cardwell]] on the CD ''Hillbilly Bop 'n' Boogie, Roots of Rockabilly 1944-1956'' * [[Jimmy Wisner]] released a hit single under the name Kokomo in 1961 * [[Kokomo Records]], a record company from the 1960/70s * [[Kokomo (band)]], a British group from the 1970s * "[[Kokomo (song)]]", by the Beach Boys (1988) * Kokomo (song), by Little Feat (1979) {{disambig}}
